column1: #Text=" Huntsman says : " We 're going to be out in the wilds for a week .
#Text=" Wan says : " I can handle myself .

#Text=" Wan says : " Well , not exactly , but I - " Hunter # 2 says : " Ah , let him come .
#Text=Not like we got any other volunteers lining up .
